attributes.action: Save children's lives put a pelican crossing on feton road next to the school
attributes.additional_details: Today (7th february 2014) another innocent school child was knocked down on Fenton road in rotherham and had to be air lifted to hospital with serious injuries, she was just 11 years old There has been numerous accidents on the busy road next to Wingfield academy on Wingfield road, including the sad death of a 11 year old school boy in 2007. The number of children behind injured is rising. How many more have to be hurt or even killed before the council take action!! Please sign to show your support to this cause and make the council listen to us! Thankyou for your help.
